body.name: Queen Size Pillows for Side and Back Bed Pillows for Sleeping 2 Pack Sleepers Super Soft Down Alternative Microfiber Filled Pillows 20 x 30 Inches
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 32 mins
features: Perfect Size: These 2 pack queen size pillows measure 20 x 30 inches( 48cm x 74cm)(approx). With their soft, fluffy feel and premium quality construction you are sure to enjoy the experience of hotel-like luxury at your own home.
Excellent Supportive Comfort: Filled with 50% Hollow fiber and 50% gel fiber, these bed pillows provide a great balance of softness and firmness and help to reduce neck pain and shoulder stiffness.

Breathable Cooling Cover: The cooling pillows' cover are made with premium quality cotton, providing a smooth, breathable and skin-friendly surface. Helps you wake up feeling refreshed instead of sweaty.
No Shift Construction: These cooling bed pillows with the plush bounce-back design will give you great support no matter you're side sleepers, stomach sleepers or back sleepers.

Easy Clean & Care: Our queen size beding pillows are machine washable with tumble dry low. The bed pillows come vacuum-sealed for shipping, once opened it will start to fluff up. Please leave 24 hours for the pillow to get to full thickness before using it.
body.description: 2PACK Features:Unit weight: About 2.2lb/1kgUnit size: 20 x 30in(48 x 74cm)Filler material: 100% polyester fiberPacking: Vacuum packingWashing instructions:1 Gentle cycle machine wash2.Do not bleach,iron and dry-cleanWe provide replacement and refund if you meet any quality issues,Please contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort, quality and a great sleep
reviews.reviewText: The Technic pillows are comfortable and support my neck. I sleep on my side and standard size pillows didn't give m the neck the comfort and support it needed. Aftery fist night of sleep I noticed I had no neck pain or stress. I purchased the Queen size and was impressed with the quality and thickness of the pillows that fluffed right up once they were out of their packaging. The quality and appearance of the pillows are a plus. A great buy for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never mind, these pillows is actually good
reviews.reviewText: At first, when I got them, I thought the pillows were way too flat which they were. But over time they got inflated and extra squishy. I get the reviews now

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it sooo much!
reviews.reviewText: The pillows are so soft but firm at the same time. I just moved into my new home and ordered these they came right on time. I love these pillows they make me feel like I’m cuddling with someone. They are very comfortable and soft like a cloud . I’m definitely going to buy more soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I liked these pillows in the review and when I received them. They are softer and have a tendency to go flat fairly quickly when laid on. I had to double up on them if I wanted to read in bed. They are made with a nice material and are nice but not what I thought they would be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Don't be alarmed when they arrive, as I was lol. When you open the box, it looks like there could be only one pillow in the package, they come in a vacuum sealed bag, and it's so thin and small it fools you lol. Very soft pillows, so if you're looking for firm, this is nit the product for you. They're fluffy, and soft. I got them for my shams, so, they're perfect. Love them!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfy.... a little flat.
reviews.reviewText: They work. You get what you pay for. These things arent terrible but soft and a little flat. But overall not bad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best plush luxuriously soft bed pillow ever!
reviews.reviewText: I buy seven or eight bed pillows a year trying to find one that’s supportive very soft and plush. Usually it’s a waste of money. However, I bought these in queen and they are just exactly what my dream pillows are like: Very soft, plush, comforting everything you want. Now if you like sleeping on a hard pillow, forget this, but I have terrible arthritis in my neck and back and these are great. So happy I found them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are nice to me. I do not like hard pillows or overstuffed pillows. These feel good under my head.
